body: @Junko. Yeah I want to see more of the 1st girl.  I started reading this series Cox of the cover art of chap 1
3 years and no sign of chap 8. This series was quite boring.
Dont understand the logic here....She complained about the toxic smoke which is quite reasonable and SHE is the problematic one ??!?!
Shit always ends antiClimactic. Like wtf happened after? Where is that other girl he made his slave? Disappointing series man. The art is kinda whatever to. Timestop is this series saving grace.
